name: template
description:
The template to use to layout this about page. Choose from:

- `jolla`
- `trestles`
- `solana`
- `marquee`
- `broadside`

name: image
description:
The path to the main image on the about page. If not specified, 
the `image` provided for the document itself will be used.

name: image-width
description: A valid CSS width for the about page image.

name: image-shape
description:
The shape of the image on the about page.

- `rectangle`
- `round`
- `rounded`

name: links
description: Links (as [navigation items](#nav-items)) to display on the about page.
